comments.diffHunk: @@ -16,6 +16,26 @@ */ /** - * Spark's machine learning library. + * RDD-based machine learning APIs (in maintenance mode). + * + * The spark.mllib package is in maintenance mode as of the Spark 2.0.0 release to + * encourage migration to the DataFrame-based APIs under the spark.mllib package.

comments.body: Ah, I made this typo while playing with JavaDoc tags ... I tried to link to the `spark.ml` Java package doc but no success and ended up with `<code>`.
comments.diffHunk: @@ -16,6 +16,26 @@ */ /** - * Spark's machine learning library. + * RDD-based machine learning APIs (in maintenance mode). + * + * The spark.mllib package is in maintenance mode as of the Spark 2.0.0 release to + * encourage migration to the DataFrame-based APIs under the spark.mllib package.
